Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Regnar> EVERYONE! You can help Komodo by sharing the content we put out. Every Tuesday we put out a tech article about what has been worked on the past week. We also have AMAs and 5 bullet Fridays. New content every week! 
If you feel like paying for advertising, feel free to raise funds and pay to promote some of these articles, but as it's been stated, it's a negative ROI.
Better would be to share them in relevant circles to the content. For example sharing Game centered articles in game dev channels, or supply chain stuff on LinkedIn with supply companies, etc. Word of mouth also is huge.
Here's where the new articles are posted:
https://komodoplatform.com/latest-news/
